name: RCGP trainee ePortfolio
description:
Tweaks to the RCGP trainee ePortfolio.

All I wanted to do was demonstrate how easy it would be for the RCGP to widen some of their pages, but I got completely carried away...
additional_info:
• Widens five pages which were a bit narrow for the tables they contained (only makes a difference on wide monitors)
  • Reduces the size of edit and delete icons
  • Learning log entries: introduces extra space between the different headings
  • Messages: clips enormous recipient lists, and puts scrollbars there
  • Learning log list: show more of the beginning of each event
Tested in:
  • Firefox 20.0 on Ubuntu
  • Firefox on Windows 7
  • Chrome on Windows 7
Please report bugs and send me suggestions. If enough people chip in, maybe the RCGP will adopt these tweaks to make ePortfolio a bit less annoying.
